Project Showcase

Parkinson's Disease Measurement

by John Turner
FIND OUT MORE

Introduction

This paper presents maps of the inferred relative prevalence of PD in England. The maps are based on data from publicly accessible data sets: * one that contains for each of the 10,000 GP practices in England the number of NHS prescriptions written for each drug in June 2012; * one that shows the post code of each practice; *one that shows the eastings and northings of each post code. The data does not explicitly mention PD, so we adopt a proxy measure. This is based on the observation that

Datasets Used

  • Prescribing data is from the monthly files published by the HSCIC
